'''Rivendell''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Rivendell]]''', the Elven dwelling in the [[Misty Mountains]]
*[[Lord of Rivendell]], a title of [[Elrond]]
*[[Reckoning of Rivendell]], the Calendar of Imladris
*[[Elvish Song in Rivendell]], a poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]

==Adaptations==
===Games===
*''[[Rivendell: The House of Elrond]]'', a [[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]] supplement
*''[[Rivendell (The One Ring role-playing game)|Rivendell]], a supplement for [[The One Ring (role-playing game)]]
===Music===
*[[Rivendell (soundtrack)]], a track on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]''
*''[[An Evening in Rivendell]]'', an album by the [[Tolkien Ensemble]]
*''[[At Dawn in Rivendell]]'', an album by the [[Tolkien Ensemble]]
*''[[Leaving Rivendell]]'', an album by the [[Tolkien Ensemble]]
*[[Rivendell (band)]], an Austrian black metal band
*[[Rivendell (song)]], a song by Canadian rock band Rush
